translation.en: [radio announcer] From Independence Mall, this is news radio, KYW Philadelphia ten--
translation.de: Aus der Independence Mall der Nachrichtensender KYW Philadelphia zehn..

translation.en: [female reporter] Absolute chaotic scene behind me right now at this intersection,
translation.de: Eine absolut chaotische Szene hinter mir
an der Kreuzung, wo heute Abend

translation.en: a bus driver collided with several oncoming vehicles,
translation.de: eine Busfahrerin mit mehreren Autos zusammenstieß,

translation.en: -one of them a cement mixer. -[grunting] All right, here we go.
A huge mess on the scene here right now.
We're still not clear as to what exactly happened here,
translation.de: Wir wissen noch nicht ganz genau, was genau passiert ist,

translation.en: whether the driver passed out while operating the vehicle
translation.de: ob die Fahrerin während der Fahrt bewusstlos wurde

translation.en: or simply died at the wheel.
translation.de: oder ob sie am Steuer starb.

translation.en: We don't have a cause of death at this point,
but some of our medical experts are talking about the fact
that it could've been a heart attack -or a stroke. -Mmm, perfect pancake!
translation.de: es könnte ein Herz- oder Schlaganfall gewesen sein.

translation.en: We don't have a name on the driver, no information at all.
translation.de: Wir kennen den Namen der Fahrerin nicht, keine Info.

translation.en: Police have not released that at this point. -Next of kin still being notified. -[cell phone rings]
translation.de: Die Polizei schweigt noch. Die Angehörigen werden benachrichtigt.

translation.en: Speaking with some of the officers here on the scene...
translation.de: Einige Polizisten hier vor Ort sagen...

translation.en: is what these officers are saying to me. Uh, we...
I feel like a piñata. [grunts] How's my baby girl?
translation.de: -Ich fühle mich wie eine Pi­ña­ta. -Wie geht's meiner Kleinen?

translation.en: Feels like she got your big feet.
Maybe I'll pick up some Doc Martens on the way out.
Had that weird pregnancy dream again.
translation.de: Ich hatte wieder den komischen Traum.

translation.en: We were still on the beach, but a little different this time.
translation.de: Wieder am Strand, aber diesmal etwas anders.

translation.en: I couldn't see you, but I knew you were with me,
translation.de: Ich sah dich nicht, aber wusste, du warst bei mir.

translation.en: like how sometimes you just know things like that in a dream.
translation.de: In Träumen weiß man so was einfach.

translation.en: Honey, you seen my other shoe?
Your shoes are under the bed.
So we were standing in the shallow water,
and we were playing that game like you play as a kid.
When the tide would go back out
[stammers] and sink lower into the wet sand.
I just kept sinking down and down,
and no matter how hard I tried, I couldn't get up.
translation.de: So sehr ich mich bemühte, ich kam nicht hoch.

translation.en: But these graveyard shifts are the worst.
translation.de: Aber diese Nachtschichten sind echt übel.

translation.en: I'm tired of having breakfast for dinner.
translation.de: Keine Lust mehr auf Frühstück am Abend.

translation.en: But I'll bring you something back to make up for it.
translation.de: Ich bringe dir eine Entschädigung mit.

translation.en: -I look forward to being proven wrong. -Deal.
translation.de: -Ich freue mich, wenn ich mich irre. -Ja.

translation.en: [sportscaster] With the shot clock winding down, Barkley coming up short once again.
translation.de: Die Wurfuhr tickt. Barkley zieht wieder den Kürzeren.

translation.en: Another good night of rebounding for Charles, but not enough buckets.
translation.de: Ein guter Rebound-Abend für Charles, aber...

translation.en: -Hey, come on, I wanna see how it ends. -[exhales]
translation.de: Ich will hören, wie es ausgeht.

translation.en: Huh, Winston Maddox, you got some amount of money riding on this tonight?
translation.de: Winston Maddox, hast du heute Geld gesetzt?

translation.en: [sportscaster] And that's all she wrote, folks.
Philadelphia loses a heartbreaker to Atlanta, 103 to 101.
translation.de: Philadelphia verliert knapp gegen Atlanta mit 103 zu 101.

translation.en: [Maddox] Thought most folks think about moving out of white trash neighborhoods.
translation.de: Die meisten wollen raus aus White-Trash-Vierteln.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Trust me, I'm working on it.
translation.de: Ja. Glaub mir, ich arbeite daran.

translation.en: You know, the first perp that ever took a swing at me was two blocks that way.
translation.de: Der erste Täter, der zuschlagen wollte, war hier in der Nähe.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You never mentioned it.
Yeah, you're all jokes now, but you've got a pregnant wife back there, pal.
translation.de: Du machst Witze, aber deine Frau ist schwanger.

translation.en: Back pain, feet the size of a kitchen sink.
But hey, maybe you can find the guy that knocked her up
translation.de: Such den Typen, der sie geschwängert hat. Der soll das machen.

translation.en: -and make him deal with it. -[laughing] Fuck you.
translation.de: Such den Typen, der sie geschwängert hat. Der soll das machen. Leck mich.

translation.en: All right, what do we got?
We've got a big pile-up downtown.
That's bridge traffic. That's gonna be, I don't know, 30 minutes?
translation.de: Das geht über die Brücke. Dauert sicher 30 Minuten.

translation.en: Ten spot says I'll get us there in 20.
Oh, 22 minutes. You owe me ten.

translation.de: Scheiße. Ich prüfe das noch mal nach.

translation.en: You know, when he, uh, dry cleans his ties, it's full starch.
-Hey, that's my wife's brother. -Tell me he's not a dick.
-Maintain a safe distance at all times. -Keep it clear over there!
This whole thing is nuts. You should've seen the bus driver.
translation.de: Das ist irre. Du hättest die Fahrerin sehen sollen. Toll.
Du hättest die Fahrerin sehen sollen. Toll. Ja? Warum?

translation.en: Oh, trust me, she's a doozy.
-Don't do it. You know how Holt gets. -I'll just take a peek.
translation.de: Du weißt, wie Holt reagiert. Nur kurz gucken.

translation.en: Is a normal, boring shift too much to ask?
translation.de: Ist eine normale, öde Schicht zu viel verlangt?

translation.en: Oh, God, do you smell that?
then hit hard on the steering wheel.
Who invited you two to the party?
Officers, I'm gonna need you to dust all this broken glass for fingerprints.
translation.de: Officer, nehmt von allen Glasscherben Fingerabdrücke.

translation.en: So how's my sis? She about to explode?
Yeah, any day. Uh, you know, these are--
Yep, we solved that one, Crockett.
Boys across town just caught two more bodies.
They said both had some kind of mark on their neck.
translation.de: Beide hatten ein Mal im Nacken.

translation.en: Pump your brakes, all right? You've had your five minutes.
We're gonna stay here. We'll relax.
Plenty of people can stand behind tape, yell at reporters. Come on.
translation.de: Sind genug da, die die Presse anbrüllen können. Komm. Ich fahre! Komm.

translation.en: Hey, just trying to learn from the best, Detective.
translation.de: Wir wollen von den Besten lernen.

translation.en: -Go ahead. -Well, there was just blood everywhere.
But no brains on this one.
No kind of hemorrhage I know of includes brain disintegration.
It could be a drug thing, you know, puncture wounds.
translation.de: Es könnten Drogen sein, wegen der Stichwunden.

translation.en: -What we need to do is run toxicology. -What do you mean, "we"?
Look, you were right about the bus driver, good call,
translation.de: Du hattest recht mit der Fahrerin,

translation.en: but I'm running point on this. You do your job, I'll do mine.
translation.de: aber ich bin Chef. Mach deinen Job, ich meinen.

translation.en: -Come on, give me a bone here. -[man] Detective! Detective Holt!
Look, look, look, I respect the hustle, I do, -but... -Detective!
Look, even though nobody said the word "serial killer" out loud yet,
that time's coming, and when it does...
translation.de: aber das kommt noch und dann...

translation.en: this is my first big one, okay.
translation.de: Das ist mein erster großer Fall.

translation.en: I need to be able to wrap my head around it on my own.
Just give me a little breathing room, all right?

translation.de: Ok. Detective, was können Sie über die zwei anderen Opfer sagen?

translation.en: Detective, what can you tell us about the other two victims?
translation.de: Detective, was können Sie über die zwei anderen Opfer sagen?

translation.en: [Holt] Sorry, everybody, no official statement yet.
You know the drill, we're still collecting evidence.
translation.de: Sie kennen das. Wir sammeln Beweise.

translation.en: [man] Is there a connection to the other deaths?
-What'd I tell you? He's a dick. -I can't answer that question,
translation.de: Sage ich doch. Er ist ein Arsch.

translation.en: and even if I could, I wouldn't do it right here, okay?
translation.de: ...ich würde es nicht hier machen, ok?

translation.en: Eh, you're just making more work for yourself,
translation.de: Du machst dir nur mehr Arbeit

translation.en: and more importantly, more work for me.
You don't want to see where this goes? Huh?
Shit. I wanna go kick bums out of the park like we're supposed to.
translation.de: Scheiße. Ich will Penner aus dem Park jagen. Unser Job.

translation.en: Yeah, well, bums will still be there when we're done, bud.
translation.de: Die sind danach auch noch da, Kumpel.

translation.en: Yeah, three bodies came in tonight, all of them had brain hemorrhaging,
translation.de: Heute kamen drei Leichen mit Hirnblutungen rein

translation.en: marks in the back of their neck.
Oh, I'm, uh, Officer Lockhart. This is Officer Maddox.
translation.de: Officer Lockhart, das ist Officer Maddox.

translation.en: Okay. Well, there's been a hold placed on that report by detective Brian Holt.
translation.de: Detective Brian Holt hat den Bericht unter Verschluss genommen.

translation.en: -Yeah, he's family, sir. I'm sure-- -I said a hold, Officer.
Can't break protocol every time some idiot's stuck with a needle.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht bei allen Nadelwunden die Vorschriften brechen.

translation.en: So it was a puncture wound.
And deep enough to impact the vertebrate.
So, some kind of poison, like blowfish toxin?
Some shit. Lab techs all have hard-ons for it.
translation.de: Irgendein Scheiß. Die Labortechniker drehen alle durch.

translation.en: Because we have no idea what it is.
No one's ever seen it before.
I've got other dead people waitin'.
[snaps fingers] All right, we need to think.
You know, I think you're supposed to say "Asian" now.
Whatever, as long as they keep that sweet and sour pork coming,
I'll call 'em whatever they want. Shit.
Listen, all I'm saying is we got people getting injected
translation.de: Ich meine nur, Leuten werden Isotope gespritzt

translation.en: with a fucking isotope of all things, and nobody can tell us shit.
translation.de: Ich meine nur, Leuten werden Isotope gespritzt und keiner sagt uns was.

translation.en: And the times of death are minutes apart, the bodies are miles apart...
translation.de: Todeszeitpunkte fast gleich, die Leichen weit verstreut.

translation.en: I'll take "crazy shit happens" for 200, Alex.
We had three random victims with the brains melted out of their faces.
translation.de: Drei Zufallsopfern floss das Gehirn raus.

translation.en: I'll admit, it's weird, but... shit.
translation.de: Ok, es ist merkwürdig, aber Scheiße.

translation.en: Remember them two yuppies washed up on the shore of the lake couple years ago?
translation.de: Weißt du noch, die zwei Yuppies, die vor Jahren angespült wurden?

translation.en: Buck naked, bruised up. Everybody thought it was a mob hit.
Turns out it was just two gays, liked it rough,
translation.de: Es waren nur zwei Schwule, die es hart mochten

translation.en: having a bit too much to drink before they went skinny dipping.
translation.de: und vorm Nacktbaden zu viel tranken.

translation.en: But you heard what the coroner said, right?
Man, your energy's all over the place, man.
Let the game come to you.
You won't have time to think about shit this much. It'll be...
translation.de: Keine Zeit mehr für diesen Scheiß. Es ist...
Hoffe ich. Her mit dem Zehner.

translation.en: It's not my fault you've got a gambling problem. Give me the money.
translation.de: Ich kann nichs für dein Glücksspielproblem. Das Geld.

translation.en: Hey, I'll strike you a deal here.
Uh, give me that... that for ten?
Gonna make a girl happy. Appreciate it.
translation.de: Meine Frau wird sich freuen. Sehr nett.

translation.en: Oh, come on, I was gonna eat that.
You're kidding me. Put it on my tab.
[police radio] Units be advised 314 at Hydra on 22nd and Armory,
translation.de: Alle Einheiten: 314 im Hydra an der 22. Ecke Armory.

translation.en: female, late teens, assaulted, blunt force to the neck.
translation.de: Angriff auf junge Frau, Schlag in den Nacken.

translation.en: Uh, dispatch, this is car 39. Could you get the officer at Hydra and get me on the radio?
translation.de: Zentrale, hier Wagen 39. Verbinden Sie mich mit dem Officer.

translation.en: -[Palmer] Go for it, Officer Palmer. -Evening. Officer Lockhart here.
translation.de: Ja, Officer Palmer. Hallo. Hier Officer Lockhart. Sehen Sie sich den Nacken des Opfers an.

translation.en: You mind looking at the back of your victim's neck?
translation.de: Hallo. Hier Officer Lockhart. Sehen Sie sich den Nacken des Opfers an.

translation.en: -All right, we're on our way. -[engine turns over]
Girl says she was stabbed with some kind of metal tool or some shit.
translation.de: Sie wurde mit einem Metallwerkzeug gestochen.

translation.en: Last week we had a guy come in from this place,
translation.de: Letzte Woche kam ein Typ von hier

translation.en: egg beater stuck up his ass, I shit you not.
translation.de: mit einem Schneebesen im Arsch rein.

translation.en: I was too impressed to be disgusted.
translation.de: Vor Staunen ekelte ich mich nicht.

translation.en: All right, tell me what happened.
She had on a blue hoodie. "She"?
Like she was in the wrong neighborhood.
Her hand was all messed up. It was covered in dried blood.
translation.de: Ihre Hand war kaputt und voll blutverkrustet.

translation.en: Okay, it's okay. Which hand? Right here.
Tom, I just got off with the coroner. What the hell?
translation.de: Tom? Der Pathologe rief gerade an. Was soll das?

translation.en: Yeah, I was just about to get you on the radio.
Listen, she's got that shit in her bloodstream. We need to--
translation.de: Sie hat das Zeug im Blut. Wir müssen...

translation.en: Don't even listen to him. It's fine.
translation.de: Hören Sie nicht hin. Alles ok.

translation.en: Come on, I just told him everything.
He's a little deaf. I want you to tell me.
translation.de: Er hört schlecht. Sagen Sie es mir.

translation.en: and out of nowhere, this crazy chick tackles me to the ground.
translation.de: und plötzlich wirft mich diese Irre zu Boden.

translation.en: These guys, they... they pulled her off me, but...
translation.de: Die Jungs zogen sie weg, aber...

translation.en: she... she poked my neck with something.
We need an EMT now! Hey! Now, now, now!
Get a medic up here! Get a medic up here! Hey, hey, hey!
[officer on radio] Stand by for a single live BOLO.
last seen at Hydra on Arch Street.
translation.de: zuletzt im Hydra in der Arch Street.

translation.en: Five foot six, twenties, dried blood on her left hand,
translation.de: 171 cm, in den 20ern, trockenes Blut an der linken Hand,

translation.en: Put your hands on your head!
suspect last seen on foot at Chestnut and University.
translation.de: Die Verdächtige war zu Fuß Chestnut Ecke University.

translation.en: This is our chance at detective.
Don't tell me you're not thinking about it.
I'm thinking I got the wrong skin tone for that.
But you got that sparkling personality.
You about to draw down on Old Saint Nick. You almost killed Christmas.
translation.de: Du hättest fast den Weihnachtsmann verhaftet.
Verdächtige läuft nach Westen über Liberty!

translation.en: I repeat, suspect heading west across Liberty!
translation.de: Ich wiederhole. Verdächtige läuft nach Westen über Liberty!

translation.en: If you've got a badge on your chest and a gun on your hip,
translation.de: Wer eine Marke und eine Pistole hat,

translation.en: I want you at that position now.
Police! Move! Go! Get out of the way!
Out of the way! Go! Move!
-[Maddox] Lock, she went this way! -[man] Hey!
I got this! I got this! Go around! Go around!
translation.de: Ich mache das! Lauf hinten rum!

translation.en: I gotta cut back to a pack a day.
translation.de: Nur noch eine Schachtel am Tag.

translation.en: All right. Meet me at Girard subway station.
[Maddox] What the fuck are you talking about?
You two, on the door! No one in and no one out!
translation.de: Ihr zwei, zur Tür! Keiner darf rein oder raus!

translation.en: Philly PD, get the fuck out of here!
[man over radio] Officer Lockhart, I've got Rosewood General on the line.
translation.de: Officer Lockhart, das Rosewood General ruft an.

translation.en: Your wife's going into labor. She's being taken there now.
translation.de: Ihre Frau ist in den Wehen. Man bringt sie dahin.

translation.en: You two, stay on this level.
Why don't you come on out?
Got the wind knocked out of me.
Fuck! I think she broke my leg.
translation.de: Scheiße! Sie brach mir das Bein.

translation.en: Officer down. Officer down. I need an ambulance at the Girard Street subway.
translation.de: Verletzter Officer. Ein Krankenwagen zur U-Bahn Girard Street.

translation.en: Stay right there. Stay right fucking there!
Get on the ground. Hey, hey!
You fucking deaf? I said get on the ground.
I said get on the ground!

translation.de: ...es tut mir leid mit deinem Partner.

translation.en: [officer] Whoa, pal! Hey, what are you still doing here?
translation.de: Hey, was machst du noch hier?

translation.en: Yes, sir. Uh, where's the maternity ward?
Uh, next building, down the hallway, elevator to the third floor.
translation.de: Im Nachbarhaus, Fahrstuhl in die dritte.

translation.en: I know it's not the best time, but I need to check a few boxes while it's still fresh.
translation.de: Ich muss einiges klären, solange es noch frisch ist.

translation.en: Okay, so far, she's a nobody,
no ID, no fingerprint matches, nothing.
All she had on her were these keys. We have no idea what they go to.
translation.de: Sie hatte nur die Schlüssel. Keine Ahnung, wofür.

translation.en: We're drawing a blank. Mean anything to you?
-Lockhart. Just give me one moment. -You didn't fire your weapon at all?
translation.de: Lockhart. Einen Moment. Sie schossen nicht?

translation.en: They pulled a bullet from our girl's wrist...
translation.de: In ihrem Handgelenk steckte eine Kugel.

translation.en: and it matches a service revolver.
-What are you talking about? -No one else reported a shot fired.
We can't make heads or tails.
what happened down there, son, in the subway station?
Are you Jeanette's husband? Yes, yes. Hi, I'm... I'm Tom... Tom Lockhart.
translation.de: -Sind Sie Jeanettes Mann? --Ja. Hi, ich bin Tom Lockhart.

translation.en: [faintly] But so far, the baby appears to be safe.
translation.de: Dem Baby geht es bisher gut.

translation.en: I'm right here. I'm right here, baby.
-It's okay. Look, I got you something. -[groaning and panting]
I got you something good. Yeah, I got you a bracelet.
translation.de: Für dich, ein Armband. Wir stehen das durch.

translation.en: We're gonna push right through this. We're gonna push right through this.
translation.de: Für dich, ein Armband. Wir stehen das durch. Wir stehen das durch.

translation.en: -Okay. Come on, Jeanie, one more push. -You're almost there, Mrs. Lockhart.
The next one, big push, okay, Jeanie? Jeanie?
translation.de: Jetzt ganz fest pressen, ok, Jeanie?

translation.en: [Tommy] It's okay. It's okay. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.de: Es ist ok, alles wird gut.

translation.en: I'm here on location in Center City
translation.de: Ich bin hier in Center City

translation.en: on the nine-year anniversary of the Market Street murders.
As you can see, protesters have gathered here once again.
They're calling for a new investigation
into the death of a still unidentified African-American suspect.
translation.de: zum Tod der immer noch unbekannten afroamerikanischen Verdächtigen.

translation.en: Those gathered here believe the Philadelphia police are to blame.
translation.de: Die Demonstranten machen der Polizei von Philadelphia Vorwürfe.

translation.en: and based on his own admission, the woman was unarmed.
translation.de: Er gab selbst zu, dass die Frau unbewaffnet war.

translation.en: Yet, he could not bring her in
without throwing her in front of a train?
translation.de: ohne sie vor einen Zug zu werfen?

translation.en: They never identified the woman's body,
and they never released a motive for the homicide.
translation.de: Und es wurde nie ein Motiv für die Morde bekannt.

translation.en: And the icing on the cake is the man got a promotion.
translation.de: Und als Sahnehäubchen wurde der Mann befördert.

translation.en: [Rendell] Whereas there's an unfortunate divide in our community today,
translation.de: Auch wenn unsere Bürger leider gespalten sind,

translation.en: we also have to remember the victims and their families.
translation.de: müssen wir auch an die Opfer denken.

translation.en: Because there are no easy answers here, just as there weren't on that night nine years ago.
translation.de: Es gibt heute keine einfachen Antworten, ebenso wenig wie vor neun Jahren.

translation.en: I thought we agreed on no more ice cream for breakfast.
translation.de: Wir sagten doch, kein Eis zum Frühstück.

translation.en: You got me, honey. Why don't you put mine in the fridge? Uh...
translation.de: Erwischt. Stell meins in den Kühlschrank.

translation.en: -That one! -I don't know. Are you sure?
translation.de: Die da! Ich weiß nicht. Sicher?

translation.en: Wow, we got so many places here.
We've got this one, we've got that one.
-it's not as good as last year's. -Oh.
Dad, we need to hurry up.
I wanna get there right when it opens.
translation.de: Ich will bei Eröffnung da sein.

translation.en: Honey, the bears are gonna be there all day.
Yeah, but brown bears are diurnal.
So we have a better chance of seeing them in the morning.
translation.de: Morgens sieht man sie am ehesten.

translation.en: Well, you know we gotta do something first though, right?
translation.de: Wir müssen zuerst was tun, ok?

translation.en: [Amy] And these. And some of these.
Whatever one you want. Or do you want pink?
Don't worry about them. They're just celebrating your birthday.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Sie feiern deinen Geburstag.

translation.en: Well, you know, some people aren't happy unless they're mad.
translation.de: Einige Leute sind nur froh, wenn sie sauer sind.

translation.en: You'll see what I mean when you get older.
Megan's dad makes his own schedule.
translation.de: Megans Dad macht seine Termine allein.

translation.en: -So, we both save lives. -[cell phone continues ringing]
What do you mean it's happening again?
translation.de: Was meinen Sie, es passiert wieder?

translation.en: See the body yet? Back of the neck?
translation.de: Sahst du den Nacken der Leiche?

translation.en: Good morning to you, too. Somebody get a badge for their birthday?
translation.de: Auch guten Morgen. Bekamst du die Marke geschenkt?

translation.en: I got the call just now.
I'm gonna be right back, okay?
No frowning. We're still going to the zoo, baby.
translation.de: Kein Stirnrunzeln. Wir fahren in den Zoo.

translation.en: Yates! Do me a solid. Look after Amy for a second.
translation.de: Yates, tun Sie mir den Gefallen, passen Sie auf Amy auf.

translation.en: -[Yates] Uh... -I appreciate it. Go. Hey, stay with her.
-Have they been here all day? -[Maddox] All day.
I don't think it's a good habit to start bringing her to work every day.
translation.de: Es ist nicht gut, sie jeden Tag mitzubringen.

translation.en: It's one time. It's a crime scene.
Yeah, calm down. She's in the car. I won't have her inspecting the corpse.
translation.de: Ruhig. Sie ist im Auto. Sie untersucht nicht die Leiche.

translation.en: You didn't, uh, put flowers on her grave, did you?
translation.de: Hast du Blumen auf ihr Grab gelegt?

translation.en: Jeanie. There were fresh flowers on the grave this morning.
translation.de: Jeanie. Es lagen frische Blumen auf dem Grab.

translation.en: Where would they get the poison? Labbies could never reverse-engineer this.
translation.de: Woher hätten die das Gift? Das Labor konnte es nicht reproduzieren.

translation.en: Well, well well, now it's a party.
Ooh, she's a whole year older.
translation.de: Sie ist ein ganzes Jahr älter.

translation.en: You didn't go by Jeanie's grave, did you?
translation.de: Du warst nicht bei Jeanies Grab, oder?

translation.en: It's an anarchist. One of those Ruby Ridge types.
translation.de: Ein Anarchist, wie bei der Ruby-Ridge-Belagerung.

translation.en: Look at us, right back in it, all this Market Street shit all over again.
translation.de: Da wären wir wieder mit dem Market-Street-Scheiß.

translation.en: -Hey, man, I'll take it from here. -All right, let's see it. What do you got?
We let these insane protesters take it up a notch every year.
translation.de: Die irren Demonstranten werden jedes Jahr heftiger.

translation.en: -This is what we get. -[Maddox] Well, up a notch to murder.
translation.de: Das haben wir davon. Es führt zum Mord.

translation.en: [Holy] It only takes one deranged enough to dress like her and kill like her.
translation.de: Eine Gestörte reicht, die sich so anzieht und so tötet.

translation.en: -Really? -If it's not one of them, who is it?
I mean, come on, you're the brilliant detectives.
-[Maddox] None of it makes any sense. -[Tommy] Has anybody else seen this?
translation.de: Es ergibt keinen Sinn. Sah das noch jemand?

translation.en: -[officer] Not so far in security. -Good, let's keep it that way.
translation.de: Keiner bisher. Gut, das bleibt so.

translation.en: No news, no talking to reporters.
Protesters are just looking for a reason to riot.
You know, there was something I never told you about that night,
translation.de: Ich hab dir was von damals verschwiegen,

translation.en: Things she shouldn't have been able to know.
translation.de: Sachen, die sie nicht wissen konnte.

translation.en: She said we'd see each other again.
translation.de: Sie sagte, wir sehen uns wieder.

translation.en: After she died, there were no more bodies.
translation.de: Nach ihrem Tod gab es keine Leichen mehr.

translation.en: We never put together any of the pieces because, hey,
translation.de: Wir setzten das Puzzle nie zusammen.

translation.en: I think it's time we put together some of the pieces.
Hey, hey, find out anything you can about these keys.
translation.de: Finden Sie alles über die Schlüssel heraus.

translation.en: -Your dad putting you to work, Amy? -She's got a point.
[reporter] Breaking news. We are going to go live with a briefing about the Market Street murders.
translation.de: Wir schalten live zum Revier über die Market-Street-Morde.

translation.en: We have reason to believe she's still currently in the city.
translation.de: Wir glauben, sie ist noch in der Stadt.

translation.en: -Our suspect is wanted in connection... -Don't... don't show her.
with the Market Street murders of 1988.
-Yeah, he's your uncle. Great job. -It is believed she may be connected to...
translation.de: -Er ist dein Onkel. Toll gemacht. -Wir glauben,

translation.en: at least two homicides in the last 24 hours.
translation.de: sie hat mit mindestens zwei Morden zu tun.

translation.en: for all law enforcement agencies in Philadelphia.
-[officer] Get me, uh... -Philly PD tip line....
[Holt] At the present moment, she is considered to be armed and extremely dangerous.
translation.de: Sie ist vermutlich bewaffnet und extrem gefährlich.

translation.en: [Yates] Yes, we are aware the killer is a woman.
translation.de: Ja, die Mörderin ist eine Frau.

translation.en: [Holt] Now to the good people of Philadelphia, let me assure you...
translation.de: Ich versichere den Bürgern von Philadelphia...

translation.en: If you or anyone you know has any information on his woman...
translation.de: Wenn jemand Informationen über die Frau hat...

translation.en: or if you've seen anyone who matches her description...
Officers are standing by to hear you.
we can apprehend a vicious criminal.
We couldn't find anything these fuckers had in common when there was four of 'em.
translation.de: Wir fanden keine Gemeinsamkeiten bei vier Leuten.

translation.en: Adding folks doesn't make it any easier.
These two both voted for Perot. Shit.
These two have nothing in common,
except for the fact that both their blood is red.
translation.de: außer dass ihr Blut rot ist.

translation.en: We never told anybody about her hand injury.
We didn't release that to the press.
How in the hell a copycat gonna know that detail?
It's nine years ago, brother. Shit gets leaked.
translation.de: Es ist neun Jahre her. So was kommt raus.

translation.en: What, you think she didn't actually die?
Please tell me that's not what you're saying.
translation.de: Bitte sag, das meinst du nicht.

translation.en: Key is to a Falcon 160. Fairly common on small airfields.
translation.de: Der Schlüssel ist von einer Falcon 160. Gängig auf kleinen Flughäfen.

translation.en: Unfortunately, there's no way to match up the key to a specific plane.
translation.de: Leider können wir ihn keinem speziellen Flugzeug zuordnen.

translation.en: It says that this plane was manufactured in 1996.
translation.de: Da steht, dieses Flugzeug wurde 1996 gebaut.

translation.en: Yeah, the model came out last year.
How in the hell did she have these keys in '88?
I made some calls. A hundred-mile radius, there's only one airfield with this model.
translation.de: Ich telefonierte rum. In 150 km gibt es das Modell nur einmal.

translation.en: Uh, hey, why don't you do me a favor and look after her until I'm back, okay?
translation.de: Hey, würden Sie auf sie aufpassen? Bin bald zurück, ok?

translation.en: Hey. I've gotta work a little bit longer, all right?
translation.de: Ich muss etwas länger arbeiten, ok?

translation.en: But Miss Tabitha right there, she's gonna look after you till I get back.
translation.de: Miss Tabitha passt auf dich auf, bis ich zurück bin.
Es ist dunkel. Der Zoo ist zu.

translation.en: I'm gonna make it up to you tomorrow when we go in the morning,
'cause that's when they're gonna be out, right?
I almost forgot. A Dr. Naveen Rao called for you three times on the tip line.
translation.de: Dr. Naveen Rao rief dreimal an der Hotline für Sie an.

translation.en: They wanna talk to me, they gotta come in. Yeah, that's what I told him.
translation.de: -Zum Reden soll er herkommen. -Das sagte ich ihm.

translation.en: Detective Lockhart, I've been waiting for over an hour.
translation.de: Ich warte seit über einer Stunde.

translation.en: Hi, my name is Naveen Rao. I'm a senior physicist at--
translation.de: Ich bin Naveen Rao, leitender Physiker an der...

translation.en: -You have from here to the door. -I know you've got a lot on your plate.
translation.de: -Sie haben bis zur Tür Zeit. -Sie sind eingespannt.

translation.en: I know what I'm going to say will sound more like fiction than fact.
translation.de: Was ich zu sagen habe, klingt eher nach Fiktion.

translation.en: The door is pretty close, by the way.
translation.de: Nicht mehr weit bis zur Tür.

translation.en: I believe your case intersects with my work in a significant way.
translation.de: Ich denke, Ihr Fall überschneidet sich mit meiner Arbeit.

translation.en: Both appearances of the murderer have happened during a specific lunar perigee.
translation.de: Die Mörderin kam beide Male während eines Supermondes.

translation.en: In this case, nine years apart.
What you may know simply as a super moon or a blood moon
are actually events of great scientific significance.
When the lunar cycle reaches exactly the right point,
its gravitational forces react with electromagnetic pockets and...
translation.de: reagieren die Gravitationskräfte mit elektromagnetischen Taschen...

translation.en: My advice: take it to Channel Five.
translation.de: Mein Rat: Gehen Sie zu Channel Five.

translation.en: Time to call it a night. Let's go home.
Oh, you see that? Someone's here.
Don't do this, man, not like this.
Hey, you got a better idea, I'm all ears.
translation.de: Hast du eine bessere Idee? Ich höre.

translation.en: -[Tommy] What's that supposed to mean? -You know.
translation.de: Was soll das heißen? Du weißt schon.

translation.en: Don't use this as some kind of fucked-up way of dealing with what happened to Jeanie.
translation.de: Nutz das nicht als verkorkstes Ventil für die Sache mit Jeanie.

translation.en: Hey, how'd you get in here?
Hey. Detective Lockhart. Uh, Philly PD.
you're here kind of late. Yeah, I had a...
I had a guy call in and cancel.
But, you know, still gotta do the paperwork, right?
translation.de: Aber den Papierkram muss ich machen.

translation.en: Well, you know, let me give you my number.
All right. Oh, uh, you know, before I forget...
what's the best way to get back to the turnpike from here?
translation.de: Wie komme ich am besten zur Mautstraße?

translation.en: Could you draw me a map?
If you were a better shot, I'd be dead.
translation.de: Könntest du besser zielen, wäre ich tot.

translation.en: Tape his wrists. -Tape his wrists! -[man] Okay, okay.
-Okay. -You. Get me the key to that plane outside.
Yeah. It's one... it's one lock 206.
Somebody give me some fuckin' bolt cutters!
You have to stop chasing me.
I'm doing all this for a reason.
translation.de: Ich tue alles aus einem Grund.

translation.en: You murdered my partner. That was never part of the plan.
translation.de: -Sie töteten meinen Partner. -Das war nie geplant.

translation.en: How the hell are you alive?
when the moon sets, I can come back.
translation.de: ...wenn der Mond untergeht, kann ich zurückkommen.

translation.en: What do you mean come back? Huh?
The more I tell you, the more you'll keep coming after me.
translation.de: Je mehr ich erzähle, desto mehr wirst du mich jagen.

translation.en: And I've seen how that turns out for you.
translation.de: Ich sah, wie das für dich läuft.

translation.en: Pretend none of this ever happened.
translation.de: Tu so, als sei nichts passiert.

translation.en: -I don't have any more time. -What are you doing? Whoa!
translation.de: -Ich habe keine Zeit mehr. -Was tun Sie?

translation.en: What the fuck were you thinking?
There's a dozen different ways you could have died.
translation.de: Du hättest auf Dutzende Arten sterben können.

translation.en: We'll continue searching the area, but so far, there's still no sign of her.
translation.de: Wir suchen weiter, aber es gibt keine Spur von ihr.

translation.en: [sportscaster] Philadelphia, their whole, white uniforms, Iverson going left to right, looking to add to the lead.
translation.de: Philadelphia in weißen Trikots. Iverson geht von links nach rechts rüber.

translation.en: Oh! A wicked crossover by Allen.
Spins into the paint, hits it out to Chris Webber.
translation.de: Schlägt ihn rüber zu Chris Webber.

translation.en: C. Webb knocks down the J with a right elbow.
translation.de: C. Webb schlägt ihn mit dem Ellenbogen.

translation.en: Natural speed now, smooth and tight in the mid-range.
translation.de: Standardtempo jetzt, alles sauber in der Mitte.

translation.en: He and A.I. continue to build a great chemistry together.
translation.de: Er und A. I. haben immer noch eine tolle Chemie.

translation.en: This time we're gonna get her.
[woman] Mr. Lockhart, in answer to your numerous inquiries,
translation.de: Mr. Lockhart, Sie fragten oft an.

translation.en: Dr. Rao has been working in the private sector for the past decade.
translation.de: Dr. Rao arbeitet seit zehn Jahren in der Privatwirtschaft

translation.en: and he has had no recent contact with this office.
translation.de: und hat keinen Kontakt zu diesem Büro.

translation.en: And even if he did, policy prevents me from giving out information -of any employee or previous-- -[turn off phone]
translation.de: Auch wenn, dürfte ich keine Informationen eines Mitarbeiters rausgeben...

translation.en: Thomas Lockhart. I'm... I'm a private investigator.
Wonder if I could just ask you a few questions about your husband.
translation.de: Darf ich Ihnen Fragen zu Ihrem Mann stellen?

translation.en: gathering information on local drug overdose cases.
translation.de: Ich sammle Infos zu einem Überdosis-Fall.

translation.en: I went away to see my sister for a week or so.
translation.de: Ich war eine Woche bei meiner Schwester.

translation.en: Cracked his head open on the desk when he fell.
translation.de: Schlug sich beim Sturz den Schädel auf.

translation.en: Still got one of them flags in here.
translation.de: Ich hab noch so eine Flagge.

translation.en: Your husband, he, um... wrote these?
Sent them all over the country
Let people have some privacy about their ideas. [chuckles]
translation.de: Um die Meinungen der Leute zu schützen.

translation.en: I was young and he a good dope.
translation.de: Ich war jung, und er war cool.

translation.en: But he took it pretty serious.
You don't know, um, who he mailed all these to, do you?
translation.de: Wissen Sie, wem er die geschickt hat?

translation.en: You heard of drinking the Kool-Aid?

translation.de: Sie versprach das Blaue vom Himmel.

translation.en: So they were working on this together?

translation.de: Bis zu ihrer Trennung. Irres Miststück.

translation.en: You know where she's at now?
You keep track of the people that fucked your wife before you did?
translation.de: Wissen Sie, wo die Typen sind, die Ihre Frau vor Ihnen fickten?

translation.en: I've been pretty generous with my time.
Lots of other things a girl could be doing.
Well, what do you propose, Arleen?
How much you got on you?
-Come on. -Please leave a message. -I'll get back to you soon as possible. -[beep]
translation.de: -Komm schon. -Bitte um Nachricht. Ich melde mich.

translation.en: We gotta meet tonight. Think I found something.
translation.de: Wir müssen uns treffen. Ich habe was gefunden.

translation.en: And if it's, uh, not too big of a... of an ask,
translation.de: Wenn es nicht zu viel verlangt ist,

translation.en: I need you to run a current address on a Heather Russell.
translation.de: könntest du die Adresse von Heather Russell prüfen?

translation.en: That beard's ridiculous. You look like a homeless person.
translation.de: Der Bart ist lächerlich. Wie ein Obdachloser.

translation.en: And it's good to see you.
Can't. Aunt Maggie's taking me to King of Prussia.
translation.de: Tante Maggie geht mit mir ins King of Prussia.

translation.en: I could've taken you to King of Prussia, too, you know?
translation.de: Ich könnte auch mit dir in die Mall.

translation.en: It's a girl's thing we're doing. Not really your scene.
translation.de: Ist für Mädels. Nicht dein Ding.

translation.en: Guidance counselor thinks I have a good shot at the scholarship to Penn.
translation.de: Ich habe gute Chancen für ein Penn-Stipendium.

translation.en: Thought you wanted to go out of state.
George is gonna stay around here, so...
Right, you told me about him before.
How's staying with Holt working out?
translation.de: Wie wohnt es sich bei Holt?

translation.en: I mean, for now, you know, honey. I mean, it's just temporary.
I'll be back on track soon enough.
translation.de: Ich bin bald wieder in der Spur.

translation.en: Uh, you know, somebody's gotta find him.
Why do you still have a scanner? You're not a cop anymore.
translation.de: Warum der Scanner? Du bist kein Cop mehr.

translation.en: Wait. Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey.
Dad, I haven't worn that thing in years.
translation.de: Das trage ich seit Jahren nicht.

translation.en: Well, I kept the receipt, so...
Look, Ames, I know how things have been.
translation.de: Ames, ich weiß, wie es ist.

translation.en: I'm not Mr. Ideal Dad or whatever.
But I'm gonna finish this thing soon.
translation.de: Aber ich löse den Fall bald.

translation.en: I promise you, and then we're gonna get back to normal.
translation.de: Versprochen. Und dann wird alles wieder normal.

translation.en: Just me and you, just like old times.
translation.de: Nur du und ich, wie früher.

translation.en: Dad, that's not how things work. You can't just...
translation.de: Das geht nicht. Du kannst nicht...

translation.en: You got that address? Heather Russell?
translation.de: Hast du die Adresse? Heather Russell?

translation.en: Yeah, that's why you're here, right?
Look, for Jane and for Amy's sake,
Hey, hey, we missed one of our victims.
Local boys wrote it off as a drug overdose so we never caught it.
translation.de: Es galt als Überdosis, und wir hörten nie davon.

translation.en: The Real American Movement. Wanted to take the country back for the true patriots.
translation.de: Die Wahren Amerikaner. Wollten das Land für Patrioten zurück.

translation.en: You know, homemade fertilizer bombs. You know the type.
translation.de: Selbst gebaute Bomben aus Dünger. Solche Typen.

translation.en: And I got his mailing list.
Two of the four victims from '97 were on it.
translation.de: Zwei der vier Opfer von '97 standen drauf.

translation.en: All of 'em from '88, that's the connection.
translation.de: Alle von '88. Das ist die Verbindung.

translation.en: They're all part of this radical movement.
And I'm thinking that isotope that she injects them with
translation.de: Ich denke, das Isotop, das sie spritzt,

translation.en: is some high-tech way of killing people remotely.
translation.de: ist Hightech, um aus der Distanz zu töten.

translation.en: And it's triggered from the future, maybe. I...
translation.de: Es wird in der Zukunft ausgelöst.

translation.en: I don't know. I don't... I don't entirely have that pinned down yet.
translation.de: Das habe ich noch nicht genau geklärt.

translation.en: and his theory about the lunar cycle bridge thing?
Had to do with the moon.
translation.de: Hatte mit dem Mond zu tun.

translation.en: She gets torn apart by a train and nine years later she's back, alive and killing.
translation.de: Ein Zug tötet sie, und neun Jahre später ist sie zurück und mordet wieder.

translation.en: So that shit in '97... she didn't come back to life.
translation.de: Und der Scheiß von 1997... Sie erstand nicht wieder auf.

translation.en: Okay? You sound like a fuckin' insane person right now. You need help.
translation.de: Ok? Du klingst wie ein Wahnsinniger. Du brauchst Hilfe.

translation.en: She knew things about me, Holt.
Have you completely lost your fuckin' mind?
translation.de: Spinnst du komplett? Du redest von einem Fall...

translation.en: You're talking about a case... that's been cold for a fuckin' decade.
translation.de: Spinnst du komplett? Du redest von einem Fall... ...der seit zehn Jahren abgelegt ist.

translation.en: You know how many murders I've had in the past week?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie viele Morde ich in der letzten Woche hatte?

translation.en: I'm raising your own daughter, for Christ sake,
and you're coming to me with fucking time travel?
translation.de: und du kommst mir mit verdammten Zeitreisen?

translation.en: Are you even listening to yourself?
I couldn't stop what happened to Jeanie. But I can stop her.
translation.de: Jeanies Tod konnte ich nicht verhindern. Aber sie kann ich stoppen.

translation.en: All I want is her address.
And I won't ask you for nothing ever again.
translation.de: Danach bitte ich dich nie wieder um etwas.

translation.en: You're chasing moonbeams while your own life got away.
translation.de: Du jagst Fantasien und verschenkst dein Leben.

translation.en: It's just fucking sad to watch.
It's sad that Amy has to watch it.
translation.de: Traurig, dass Amy das sehen muss.

translation.en: I'm sorry for all the shit, man.
And I'm sorry for you taking care of Amy and, uh...
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass du dich um Amy kümmerst und...
Bitte. Komm schon. Es ist ok.

translation.en: if you're serious about getting out, I got your back.
translation.de: Wenn du es ernst meinst, helfe ich dir.

translation.en: Take care of yourself. I'm gonna give the department shrink a call.
translation.de: Pass auf dich auf. Ich rufe die Polizeipsychiaterin an.

translation.en: See if she can make a recommendation.
I'm gonna owe you one. You're a good man, Holt.
translation.de: Ich schulde dir was. Du bist ein guter Kerl.

translation.en: No, I'm a dick and I know it. But you're family, so...
translation.de: Nein, ich bin ein Arsch und weiß es. Aber du gehörst zur Familie.

translation.en: That's what we do, right? We take care of each other. Even the crazy ones.
translation.de: So ist das. Wir sorgen füreinander. Auch für die Irren.

translation.en: Yes, hi, this is, uh, Captain Holt.
translation.de: Ja, hi, hier ist Captain Holt.

translation.en: I just need a last known address for a Heather Russell.
translation.de: Ich brauche die Adresse von Heather Russell.

translation.en: [man on TV] Save up to 80 percent by buying factory direct.
translation.de: Sparen Sie bis zu 80 % durch den Fabrikkauf.

translation.en: ...a direct diamond importer and manufactures factory direct.
The Jewelry Factory has thousands of diamonds and setting mounds
translation.de: Die Jewelry Factory hat Tausende Diamanten

translation.en: Ms. Russell, mind if I come in?
Get out of the car. Get out.
I shot her in the hand!
translation.de: Ich schoss ihr in die Hand!

translation.en: This is when she gets shot. I'm the one who did it. It already happened!
translation.de: Hier wird sie angeschossen. Von mir. Es geschah bereits!

translation.en: But we've gotta wait nine more years, Holt. We've gotta wait!
translation.de: Aber wir müssen neun Jahre warten. Wir müssen warten!

translation.en: But listen, if we kill her, we can stop it all from happening.
translation.de: Wenn wir sie töten, können wir alles verhindern.

translation.en: I could be there for Jeanie, Holt. We can stop it all from happening, Holt!
translation.de: Ich kann für Jeanie da sein. Wir können alles verhindern!

translation.en: Listen to me! Hey, listen to me!
translation.de: Hör mir zu! Hey, hör mir zu!

translation.en: attempting termination of marks one through three.
translation.de: ...versuche Beendigung der Male eins bis drei.

translation.en: I have brain dissolution on mark one.
translation.de: Mal eins weist eine Gehirnauflösung auf.

translation.en: And on marks two and three.
translation.de: Und Male zwei und drei auch.

translation.en: I think we may have a winner.
With the pairing of the coronal isotopes,
we could eventually be triggering this solution from a future point in time.
translation.de: könnten wir diese Lösung bald aus der Zukunft heraus anstoßen.

translation.en: George and I have been talking it over and...
I'd like you to be here for it.
I think it's what Mom would have wanted, and...
translation.de: Ich denke, Mom hätte es so gewollt.

translation.en: I think it's what I want too, so...
I know it's that time of year again, and I know things between us have been...
translation.de: ...es ist wieder diese Zeit im Jahr, und zwischen uns ist es...

translation.en: But I'd still love it if you could make it.
translation.de: Aber es wäre schön, wenn du kommst.

translation.en: [Naveen] I knew you'd be back, Mr. Lockhart.
I really am sorry about all this.
You're a hard man to find, Rao. You disappeared on me.
translation.de: Sie sind schwer zu finden, Rao. Sie waren weg.

translation.en: Of all people, you should understand an obsession with work.
translation.de: Gerade Sie sollten besessene Arbeit verstehen.

translation.en: Yeah, speaking of work, you can just let me out right here.
translation.de: Apropos, Sie können mich hier rauslassen.

translation.en: I'm afraid I cannot do that.
If you don't, she keeps killing.
Changing the world is a bloody business, Thomas.
translation.de: Die Welt zu verändern, ist blutig.

translation.en: I think we're both a little beyond the pale, really.
translation.de: Ich denke, wir fallen beide etwas aus dem Raster.

translation.en: I'll be keeping you in a safe place for the next few days.
translation.de: Sie sind die nächsten Tage an einem sicheren Ort.

translation.en: It was your investigation that made me realize she wasn't a murderer at all...
translation.de: Durch Ihre Ermittlung wurde mir klar, sie ist keine Mörderin...

translation.en: and a culmination of my own research.
I'm developing the technology she'll use one day.
translation.de: Ich entwickle die Technologie, die sie nutzen wird.
Na ja, die sie jetzt nutzt.

translation.en: Time travel is complicated. Hard for even me to wrap my head around.
translation.de: Zeitreisen sind kompliziert. Selbst für mich knifflig.

translation.en: To stop something much, much worse.
translation.de: Um etwas viel Schlimmeres zu verhindern.

translation.en: Imagine you could erase the American Civil War.
translation.de: Angenommen, Sie könnten den Bürgerkrieg löschen.

translation.en: Robert E. Lee? Lincoln? All the Confederate and Union leaders?
translation.de: Lee? Lincoln? Alle Köpfe von Konföderierten und Union?

translation.en: But that might not be enough to erase an idea.
translation.de: Zu wenig, um eine Idee zu löschen.

translation.en: Maybe we have to kill the people who made them who they are,
translation.de: Vielleicht müssen wir die Ideengeber töten,

translation.en: who gave them their moral and political beliefs.
translation.de: die moralische und politische Überzeugungen prägten.

translation.en: How far back would you have to go to snuff out the spark that lit the fuse?
translation.de: Wie weit müssten Sie zurück, um den Ursprung zu ersticken?

translation.en: But if you eliminated the right combination of people,
translation.de: Aber wenn man die richtigen Leute eliminiert,

translation.en: until you got to the exact start of it,
until you got to the one that undoes it all...
And I won't let you stop her.
translation.de: Und Sie halten sie nicht auf.

translation.en: We can't feel it's pull, but we know it's always there.
translation.de: Wir spüren seinen Sog nicht, aber er ist da.

translation.en: You know, the moon is responsible for conditions that allow life on Earth.
translation.de: Dem Mond sind die Lebensumstände auf der Erde zu verdanken.

translation.en: Well, now, it's responsible for us being able to save ourselves from ourselves.
translation.de: Jetzt verdanken wir es ihm, dass wir uns vor uns retten können.

translation.en: You have to let her finish!
You know, when I kill you...
you'll never be able to kill anybody.
Some version of me won't have to chase you.
translation.de: Irgendeine Version von mir muss Sie nicht jagen.

translation.en: the world as you know it will end in a very short time.
translation.de: ...wird die Welt, die du kennst, schon sehr bald untergehen.

translation.en: You're not the only one trying to change the past.
translation.de: Nicht nur du willst die Vergangenheit ändern.

translation.en: I've known you my entire life.
translation.de: Ich kenne dich mein Leben lang.

translation.en: You're the one who told me to take this job.
translation.de: Du sagtest mir, ich soll es machen.

translation.en: And you taught me how to ride a bicycle.
You made me my first ice cream pancakes.
translation.de: Du machtest mir meine ersten Eis-Pancakes.

translation.en: And you held me on the day I was born.
translation.de: Und du halfst mir am Tag meiner Geburt.

translation.en: you actually come around to what I'm doing.
You have to go back and you have to stop me.
Time travel is a one-way trip.
translation.de: Für Zeitreisen gibt es keine Rückfahrkarte.

translation.en: I can't go back until my mission's complete.
translation.de: Ich kann erst nach Ende meiner Mission zurück.

translation.en: If it begins with you warning me here in this beach...
translation.de: Wenn sie mit deiner Warnung hier am Strand beginnt...

translation.en: then it always ends with me dying.
translation.de: ...dann endet sie immer mit meinem Tod.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -I have to go. -I'm sorry. -I have to go.
[female automated voice] Welcome to Rao Technology.
an ordinary man parked an ordinary truck
translation.de: ...parkte ein normaler Mann einen normalen Truck

translation.en: full of homemade explosives downtown and watched it explode.
translation.de: voll mit Eigenbau-Sprengstoff in der Stadt und sah beim Explodieren zu.

translation.en: [woman] His attack was just the first.
[woman] Eleven thousand people died the first morning.
Millions more in the Civil War that followed.
[woman] It made monsters out of men.
The voice that gave birth to a movement...
translation.de: Die Stimme, die eine Bewegung auslöste...

translation.en: ...turned a small crack into a great divide.
translation.de: ...machte aus einem kleinen Riss einen großen Spalt.

translation.en: It drowned out the best of us.
translation.de: Sie übertönte die Besten von uns.

translation.en: So we found a way to silence it.
translation.de: Also fanden wir einen Weg, damit sie verstummt.

translation.en: We found a way to undo the damage.
translation.de: Wir fanden einen Weg, um den Schaden rückgängig zu machen...

translation.en: [woman] I volunteered to untell the story.
translation.de: Ich bot mich an, die Erzählung zu löschen.

translation.en: [woman] I came back to erase an idea.
translation.de: Ich kam zurück, um eine Idee zu löschen.

translation.en: Because some thoughts are meant to be buried.
When the war between us all disappears...
translation.de: Wenn der Krieg zwischen uns allen verschwindet...

translation.en: There will be no great tale in your time.
translation.de: Es wird keine große Geschichte in deiner Zeit geben.

translation.en: Just an echo of what might have been.
translation.de: Nur ein Echo dessen, was gewesen sein könnte.

translation.en: And it's time to start your next chapter.
translation.de: Und es ist Zeit für dein nächstes Kapitel.

translation.en: You will teach me how to live.
translation.de: Du wirst mir das Leben beibringen.

translation.en: And you will make me who I am.
translation.de: Du machst mich zu der, die ich bin.

translation.en: both of our lives are about to begin.
translation.de: ...wird das Leben für uns beide erst beginnen.
